update.description:
Depth camera data (array of floats) are now published to topics of type `ImagesStamped`.

DepthCameraSensor now inherits from CameraSensor to minimize duplicate code

The image topic viewer has also been improved to support visualizing depth data in grayscale format.

1. insert Depth Camera model into world 

1. Ctrl+T to bring up Topic Viewer

1. select `/gazebo/default/depth_camera/link/camera/image` to see the depth camera data 

![depth_camera.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/209358848-depth_camera.png)

[jenkins gpu-nvidia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/77/) ok

content.raw:
We should start following this:
https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#The__define_Guard

The `#define` guard should be `_<PROJECT>_<PATH>_<FILE>_HH_`
content.html:
We should start following this: https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#The__define_Guard

The #define guard should be _<PROJECT>_<PATH>_<FILE>_HH_
